data.title: Barbara Robinson - Real Estate Agent in Your Area
data.meta_description: Find real estate agent & Realtor® Barbara Robinson in your city on Realtor.com®, your source for top rated real estate professionals.
data.text:
Barbara A. Robinson, New Jersey Licensed Real Estate Broker in the Industry since 1973 has joined the forces with Coldwell Bankers Realtor of Caldwell, N J.

Barbara has served as President of the Oranges and Maplewood Board of Realtors. And is a lifetime member of the Realtors Political Action Committee. In addition she is the New Jersey Association of Realtors, Federal Political Coordinator for Congressman Donald M Payne. Barbara was named Realtor of the year in 1992 by the NJ AR, for the Oranges /Maplewood Board of Realtors

In 1990 The National Association of Realtors, selected Barbara as one of seventeen Certified Professional Standard Instructors in New Jersey. Her duties included, attending hearings for various committees, teaching courses in Fair Housing and Anti Trust regulations.

Barbara was also cited for her work updating the New Jersey Real Estate examination for Realtors as a contributing writer for the Real Estate Commission. In addition she has received numerous sales and listing awards, including multiple Million Dollar Year, sales recognition.

Barbara's civic activities include acting as Moderator for the" Yes You Can" Buy a Home in New Jersey Campaign. She served as a Video Moderator for two Video Teleconferences that were sponsored by the Governor of New Jersey's Office, in the early 1990's.

As, a long time resident to Essex County, Barbara is able to specialize in the marketing and sales of properties in all of northern New Jersey of which she has extensive knowledge, as she has successfully completed.

Barbara is a proud Mother and Grandmother of two. Her legacy goes on with her daughter who also is successfully mastering the real estate industry in Atlanta, Georgia (Patricia Robinson Owens).
